content: चक्रिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [चक्रमस्त्यस्य इनि] {@--1@} Having a wheel, wheeled. {@--2@} Bear ing a discus. {@--3@} Driving in a carriage. {@--4@} Circular, round. {@--5@} Indicative (सूचक). {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} An epithet of Viṣṇu; <ls>Śi. 13. 22.</ls> {@--2@} A potter. {@--3@} An oilman. {@--4@} An emperor, a universal monarch, absolute ruler. {@--5@} The governor of a province. {@--6@} An ass. {@--7@} The ruddy goose. {@--8@} An informer. {@--9@} A snake. {@--10@} A crow. {@--11@} A kind of tumbler or juggler.
